data.actual_result: The scroll bar will go up then back to the bottom again a few times then eventually work.
data.expected_result: The scroll bar will go up and you will be able to scroll through the channel
data.short_description: Scrolling does not work properly using scroll wheel in DM channels. When you try to scroll earlier into a channel (from the bottom) the scroll bar will keep moving back to the bottom of the channel a couple times until it eventually works.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a DM channel - Attempted to scroll earlier into the channel.
